question: Can the Level 12 Percival von, race human, class gunslinger, with friends, hex, and minor illusion feats use Friends to gently suggest that Grog Strongjaw the level X Barbarian Goliath enchant Vex'ahlia the Level X Ranger Half-Elf to hand everything over?
answer: Friends can be used to make a suggestion.
rules: Spellcasting > Casting a Spell > Components > Verbal (V)
rules_explanation: The Friends feat grants verbal components to a character, so the character can attempt to make the attempt to suggest something as a friend.

question: If the DM decides that the sheet of paper allows them, are a group of adventurers allowed to choose the sheet instead of having a fumble chart?
answer: That is up to the DM's call.
rules_explanation:
The text states in the In older editions, in some variations, if you were to roll a natural one, it wasn't just an auto miss, it was--
